name: wrap_wide_char_forced_wrap
description: A wide (double-width) character at the rightmost column wraps to the next line instead of splitting across lines
comment: Print ABCD (fills cols 0-3, cursor at col 4). Print wide char U+4E2D at col 4: col+1=5>=5, so wrap first then print at (1,0)-(1,1). Col 4 stays blank.
